title: Businessboard
description: Financial reporting application, built for golf clubs but later pivoted to general businesses. Uses integrations to services like GIT (Golf IT), Visma and Fortnox.

title: Vellinge.se
description: Site with services like My Pages, Selfservice and also IoT integrations with parking sensors and water temperature. Built to be flexible for the customer with the help of Optimizely CMS

title: Cooperation Southwestern Sk√•ne
description: A joint project between several municipalities in cooperation with the Swedish Public Employment Service. The goal of the project was to enable all stakeholders to share information on one shared website.

title: P-botten
description: Me and a friend from university are currently building a web service to help make life easier for environmental parking.
